resources.string: Foresee approaching vehicle in\nblind curve area
Provides alarm and indicator system\nin terms of possible hazard
CurVision, an app that will serve as your vision\nto blind curve areas
Create an account to enjoy riding with safety precautions
Reduce Speed: Slow down before\nentering the blind curve.
Stay in Your Lane: Always stay in\nyour lane while navigating a blind\ncurve.

Keep a Safe Distance: Maintain a
safe distance from the vehicle in
front of you, allowing ample time to
stop or maneuver if needed.
Look Ahead: Try to anticipate the\ncurvature of the road by looking as\nfar ahead as possible.
Stay Sober: Never drive under the\ninfluence of alcohol or drug.

Received info at around 8:20AM more or less about a Vehicular Accident at Binongkalan, Catmon, Cebu arrived at the area aroubd 8:30AM more or less. Binongkalan is about 12 klm away from Town Proper, naabot didto sa area pero nadala na ang mga pasyente padulong sa Danao.
Watch for Warning Signs: Pay attention to any warning signs or road markings indicating the presence of blind curves ahead.
LOOK: A vehicular accident figured in Binongkalan, Catmon, Cebu (Tuesday) -TheFreeman
